sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-container
    class="px-0"
    fluid
  >
    <v-radio-group v-model="radioGroup">
      <v-radio
        v-for="n in 3"
        :key="n"
        :label="`Radio ${n}`"
        :value="n"
      ></v-radio>
    </v-radio-group>
  </v-container>
</template>


<script>
export default {
  props: ["readonly", "emitter", "ikey", "getData", "putData"],
  data:() => {
    return {
      value: 0,
      radioGroup: 1,
    };
    
  },
  methods: {
    change(e) {
      this.value = e.target.value;
      this.update();
    },
    update() {
      if (this.ikey) this.putData(this.ikey, this.value);
      this.emitter.trigger("process");
    }
  },
  mounted() {
    this.value = this.getData(this.ikey);
  }
}
</script>

<style scoped>
select, input {
  width: 100%;
  border-radius: 30px;
  background-color: white;
  padding: 2px 6px;
  border: 1px solid #999;
  font-size: 110%;
  width: 170px;
}
</style>
